EmailTemplate.description: Case status changed to closed due to elapsed time from resolved
EmailTemplate.name: Send Email Notification on Case Closed JP_en
EmailTemplate.subject: 【Thank you very much】from DAZN
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!Case.Account}, Thank you very much for your inquiry. Thank you for your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber} about {!Case.Type}. We hope your question was satisfactorily answered by our Customer Support team, and you're now using DAZN without any issues. We have now closed your inquiry ID:{!Case.CaseNumber} about {!Case.Type}. If you are still having problems, there's some helpful information here https://stag.dazn.com/help. Or please contact Customer Support directly https://stag.dazn.com/contactus who are happy to help. Ensuring that you enjoy DAZN is our priority.
